description:
Nanofreeze specializes in innovative cold chain solutions to reduce food losses and carbon dioxide emissions. Their products include foldable coolers that maintain the cold chain for biological products and food, cold packs designed for exports that reduce losses by up to 99%, and refrigeration panels that cut commercial refrigerator energy consumption by up to 50%.

Production involves an environmentally sustainable gel made in Colombia, with allied suppliers in China. The team comprises engineers, sales representatives, and accounting staff working together to deliver effective cold chain solutions.

Nanofreeze's products significantly cut losses in perishable goods, enhancing the food system's efficiency and sustainability.
name: Nanofreeze
